metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11884 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - high
metadata.Description:
In the Linux kernel 4.19 through 5.6.7 on the s390 platform, code executionmay occur because of a race condition, as demonstrated by code inenable_sacf_uaccess in arch/s390/lib/uaccess.c that fails to protectagainst a concurrent page table upgrade, aka CID-3f777e19d171. A crashcould also occur.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11884` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-99.100
linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-99.100
linux-image-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.15.0-99.100
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-99.100
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.15.0-99.100
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-5.3.0-51-generic - 5.3.0-51.44~18.04.2
linux-image-5.3.0-51-generic-lpae - 5.3.0-51.44~18.04.2
linux-image-5.3.0-51-lowlatency - 5.3.0-51.44~18.04.2
linux-image-unsigned-5.3.0-51-generic - 5.3.0-51.44~18.04.2
linux-image-unsigned-5.3.0-51-lowlatency - 5.3.0-51.44~18.04.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1168-azure - 4.15.0-1083.93
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-5.3.0-1019-aws - 5.3.0-1019.21~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1153-gcp - 4.15.0-1071.81
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-5.4.0-152-generic - 5.4.0-37.41~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-152-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-37.41~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-152-lowlatency - 5.4.0-37.41~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-152-generic - 5.4.0-37.41~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-152-lowlatency - 5.4.0-37.41~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
